title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when selecting the dataset
OB: When I set an alias for columns in a data set and then select that data set in the expression builder, the expression builder still displays the old column names instead of the alias.
EB: The expression builder should display the alias names of the columns when a data set with aliases is selected.
SR:
1. Create a data set with columns.
2. Set aliases for the columns.
3. Open the expression builder.
4. Select the data set with aliases.
5. Verify that the expression builder displays the alias names of the columns.
